name: Serpent Rock Technology
author: Hans Messersmith
description: This manufacturer represents possession of and/or permission to make use of the KĒTŎS frame, the ancient station on the island of Serpent Rock it was discovered within, and the unique NHP, also called KĒTŎS, which is encased within it. Mechanically, it can be partially be treated as a LL0 supplement to the GMS gear, weaponry, systems, and frames that is only available to one player who is resident on the moon of Life in the Orb system and who has been granted the privilege of access and use.
